amendment.description: To strike section 2001(b)(4) relating to reconciliation instructions to the Committee on Energy and Commerce of the House of Representatives to cut $880,000,000,000 from Medicaid.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1989 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 189.

action.text: Amendment SA 1989 proposed by Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 1717.
